    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Kompanjon</string>
            <string language="en">Kompanjon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kompanjon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Kompanjon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Kompanjon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Kompanjon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Kompanjon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Kompanjon</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Det är svårt att driva företag tillsammans. Avtal kan underlätta så att konflikter kan lösas.Modul 4 - Administration och Regler.Ingår i FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
            <string language="en">It is difficult to run companies together. Agreements can facilitate so that conflicts can to be solved.

Module 4 - administration and rules.

Is included in FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">ekonomi</string>
            <string language="sv">kompanjonskap</string>
            <string language="sv">avtal</string>
            <string language="sv">driva företag</string>
            <string language="sv">kontrakt</string>
            <string language="sv">jurist</string>
            <string language="en">economy</string>
            <string language="en">kompanjonskap</string>
            <string language="en">agreements</string>
            <string language="en">drift companies</string>
            <string language="en">contracts</string>
            <string language="en">legal adviser</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Es ist schwierig, die zusammen zu leiten Firmen. 
Vereinbarungen können erleichtern, damit $überschneidungen 
einmachen, um solved.Module 4 zu sein - die Leitung und rules.Is, die 
in FöretagarSKOLAN eingeschlossen sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Il est difficile de diriger des compagnies 
ensemble. Les accords peuvent faciliter de sorte que les 
conflits mettent en boîte d'être solved.Module 4 - gestion et 
rules.Is inclus dans FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É difícil funcionar junto as companhias. 
Os acordos podem facilitar de modo que os conflitos enlatem para
ser solved.Module 4 - administração e rules.Is incluídos em 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È difficile da dirigere insieme le aziende. 
Gli accordi possono facilitare in modo che i conflitti 
inscatolino per essere solved.Module 4 - gestione e rules.Is inclusi 
in FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι δύσκολο να τρεχτούν οι επιχειρήσεις από 
κοινού. Οι συμφωνίες μπορούν να διευκολύνουν έτσι ώστε οι 
συγκρούσεις μπορούν να είναι λυμένη ενότητα 4 - η διοίκηση και 
οι κανόνες συμπεριλαμβάνονται σε FφretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Es difícil dirigir las compañías juntas. 
Los acuerdos pueden facilitar de modo que los conflictos puedan 
para ser solved.Module 4 - administración y rules.Is incluidos en 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
